Build Initial Configurations
============================

Build atomistic initial configuration of the hexagonal (HII) or bicontinuous
cubic (QI) phase. This method implements the methods of:

.. toctree::
      :maxdepth: 2
      :titlesonly:

      hexagonal_build
      bcc_build

.. argparse:: 
   :filename: ../LLC_Membranes/setup/build.py
   :func: initialize
   :prog: build.py
